'''Anderson''' is an ER physician.

==History==
Anderson treated Charlotte when she came into the ER with a concussion and a scalp laceration. He gave her a prescription for pain medication.

He became concerned when Charlotte was still coming to him months later for pills because she'd become addicted. However, she insisted she was fine and he agreed to write the prescription.

Charlotte later came back into the hospital after causing a car accident while using drugs. Anderson pronounced the patient dead and then asked if he could check Charlotte out. Charlotte refused and left the hospital, saying she was fine.

==Career==
He worked in the ER of the hospital Charlotte worked at prior to her work at St. Ambrose.

==Notes and Trivia==
*It's unknown if Anderson is his first name or his last name.
